snippet.title: GravityCab Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2577010/Gravity_Cab

In Gravity Cab, players take on the role of a taxi driver to transport passengers underground in a challenging environment of a distant planet. The taxi is controlled by thrusters and effects of physics, such as momentum and gravity, significantly influence the vehicle's movement. The gameplay involves mastering the the taxi's controls, navigating around obstacles and hazards, and solving puzzles to successfully complete each mission.

Gravity Cab offers a modern take on the classic Space Taxi game (originally released in 1984 for the C64). While building upon its adventurous essence, players learn to expertly manoeuvre the cab in various circumstances, leading to the unfolding of a captivating story.

Website: https://gravitycabgame.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/yPEDRcsMaA
